name: Town O' Cheese
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the "GAMinG jam" in Brazil.

I created and developed the game by myself, with no engines or libraries! Full C++, Handmade-Hero-style.

It is a bit weird and crazy but I hope you enjoy it. I had a lot of fun making it.

--------

Instructions:

WASD for moment;

Move into the falling objects to pick them up;

ARROW KEYS to throw a picked item;

Group THREE object of the same kind to score points and expand the chronometer.

--------

Credits:

Created and Developed by Daniel Zaidan

Music: "Run Amok" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
